title: Ticket #542: job_core_basic_par fails randomly
description:
The job_core_basic_par test randomly fails on the master branch. The cause appears to be a race condition in this code: 

	if (shutdownPolicy == WAIT_FOR_ALL) {
    	for ( int i=0 ; i<=ResourceList.getlast() ; i++ ) {
			RemoteResource *r = ResourceList[i];
			// If the policy is wait for all nodes to exit
			// see if any are still running.  If so,
			// just return, and wait for them all to go
			if (r->getResourceState() == RR_EXECUTING) {
				return;
			}
		}


	}

The code only checks for resources in the state EXECUTING. When the test fails, some resources are still in STARTUP when the master node exits.

It is not clear to me why this test is only failing on the master branch. The earliest cases of this failure that I see are from 5/19.

I will go ahead and check in a fix for the above race condition in the stable series to be code reviewed by Greg.
